sentences.en: Concrete is composed of cement, sand and gravel mixed with water.
sentences.cn: 混凝土由水泥 、 砂、石子与水掺和而构成.

sentences.en: Gravel is much used for road - making.
Her feet scrunch on the gravel.
sentences.cn: 她的脚喀嚓喀嚓地踩在沙砾上。
我嘎吱嘎吱地走过石子路。

sentences.en: I signed in and crunched across the gravel to my room.
sentences.cn: 我签到后嘎吱嘎吱走过石子路来到我的房间。

sentences.en: I've got half a ton of gravel in the lorry but he won't sign my delivery note.
sentences.cn: 我的卡车里装着半吨沙砾，但他不给我签收送货单。

sentences.en: It is wise to start infilling with a layer of gravel for drainage.
sentences.cn: 先铺上一层利于排水的砾石是个明智的做法。

sentences.en: It was raining quietly and steadily and there were little pools of water on the gravel drive.
sentences.cn: 雨一直静静地下着，沙砾车道上积起了一摊摊水。

sentences.en: More gravel is needed to fill the hollow in the drive.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的砾石来填平车道上的坑洼.

sentences.en: She heard the crunch of tires on the gravel driveway.
sentences.cn: 她听到轮胎轧过石子铺成的车道，发出嘎吱声。

sentences.en: This area of former farmland was worked as a gravel pit until 1964.
sentences.cn: 这块过去曾是农田的地1964年前一直被用作沙砾坑。

sentences.en: Two young men were racing motorcycles on the loose gravel.
sentences.cn: 两个小伙子正在松散的砾石路面上赛摩托车。

sentences.en: We bought six bags of gravel for the garden path.
sentences.cn: 我们购买了六袋碎石用来铺花园的小路.
